Races

Club-sponsored races

The Charlottesville Racing Club organizes several races each year in a number of disciplines.

Beaver Blitz

April 30, 2022

Register: https://www.bikereg.com/beaver-blitz-2022

Beaver Blitz is a multi-lap mountain bike race hosted at Teventrails, the private trail system maintained by Shawn Tevendale, the owner of Blue Ridge Cyclery (a CRC sponsor) in Charlottesville.

Castle Hill CX

Castle Hill CX is a Cyclocross hosted by sponsor Castle Hill Cidery each November.

Other races

CRC participates in races in a wide variety of disciplines. Many of these events can be found on Bikereg.com, although some disciplines have specific calendars maintained by other regional cycling organizations.
